name: Some Some Convenience Store
storyline:
I got a part time job at a convenience store. I was bored so I used my smartphone.
And download the love application [SOME SOME]. When I turn on SOME SOME, I start a new relationship with three girls... A junior part-time job, a foreign singer trainee, and a bodyguard who looks somewhat sloppy.
What's your choice?
summary: A game about starting a relationship while working part-time at a convenience store.
